html:
JP Morgan Securities PLC, an investment banking company, has completed the sale of 60 million existing shares in Airtel Africa PLC, a provider of telecommunications and mobile money services, at a price of GBP0.8 per share for a total of GBP48 million. The placing shares represent approximately 1.6% of Airtel Africa. JP Morgan Cazenove acted as sole bookrunner for the placement.

Deal In Brief

Deal Value (US$ Million)64.32
Deal TypePrivate Placement
Sub-CategoryNone
Deal StatusCompleted: 2020-12-15

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Airtel Africa Plc
Acquirer (Company)Undisclosed Investor(s)
Vendor (Company)J.P. Morgan Securities Plc
